title: Australian diary. No. 001
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The following itms are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: seventy 16 footer class yachts race on Sydney Harbour; cattle being sold at Wodonga after travelling on the hoof; pineapple harvesting in Queensland; an expert and his children demonstrate boomerang throwing; the University of Western Australia and St. George’s College are shown; surfriding on huge seas at Manly is shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
